title: Jack and Lily's Favorite Food
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 170L
description: What foods do Jack and Lily like? Are the two alike or different? This book allows students to compare and contrast the two characters. Students will love the detailed, supportive illustrations. Repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: chicken, different, pork, salmon, same, tuna
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /l/ sound
Capitalization : Recognize and use capital letters
Alphabetizing : Alphabetize words by their initial letter

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
